text: 2.16 Luk 2.34, Jon 9.39, 1 Ko 15.10, 2 Ko 3.5-6, 1 Pi 2.7-8 Binɨb mab ke yɨneb amnɨg gɨ mɨdebal okok, kuy nokom anɨb anep nɨŋɨd, ak chɨp kuy tek owup ak, chɨnop gek kumnɨgun tek lup agɨl gos nepal. Binɨb pen God kɨlop tɨg asɨk dɨ mɨdeb okok, kuy anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, ak kuy tep pel mɨdep owup ak, chɨnop gek pelpel yonɨgun tek lup agɨl gos nepal. Pen bɨ an wog anɨb ak tek gɨtep gonɨmuŋ tek lup? Bɨ anɨb ak tek olap ma yɨbɨl mɨdeb.
